org.nuiz.parallelRecommend
Class FileDataList

java.lang.Object
  org.nuiz.parallelRecommend.DataListImpl
      org.nuiz.parallelRecommend.FileDataList
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<Datum>, DataList
public class FileDataList
extends DataListImpl

Reads in a text file, specifically one which has 4 fields separated by some string.

  1. The user id (integer)
  2. The item id (integer)
  3. The rating (decimal)
  4. Timestamp (integer)
This has been specifically coded for the movieLens data, though other data transformed ot this format will also work. The data is shuffled, so that by taking contiguous sublists for validation, you still get a proper random sample.

Author:
Robert Newey
